question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: Em que parte da Península Ibérica se situa Teruel, em Espanha?
answer: Teruel se situa na parte nordeste da Península Ibérica, na comunidade autónoma de Aragão, em Espanha.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is located in the north-eastern part of the Iberian Peninsula, in the autonomous community of Aragon in Spain.
